It is near to the border of the state of Coahuila. The city was named in honor of Francisco Gómez Palacio y Bravo, former Governor of Durango. In 2010, 327,985 people lived there, which makes it the state's second-largest community. == References == Category:Cities in Mexico Category:Settlements in Durango
title: Gómez Palacio, Durango
